hero.headline: The AI Chief of Staff for Dynamic Duos.
hero.subheadline: Stop nagging. Stop forgetting. Olive listens to your WhatsApp voice notes, receipts, and links, and organizes them instantly. Perfect for Couples and Co-Founders.

chooseMode.headline: How do you partner?
chooseMode.subheadline: Olive adapts to your relationship style.

couples.headline: End the 'Mental Load' Imbalance.
couples.painPoint: One of you remembers everything. The other is chaotic. Olive bridges the gap.

cofounders.headline: A Shared Brain for your Startup.
cofounders.painPoint: Slack is too noisy. Notion is too slow. Get a private, high-speed channel for decision-making.

superpowers.headline: Not features. Superpowers.
superpowers.subheadline: Olive doesn't just store information. She understands it.

receipt.title: The Context-Aware Receipt Hunter
receipt.description: Don't just save receipts. Olive reads them, categorizes them, and warns you if you're blowing the budget. No manual entry.

memory.title: The Memory Vault
memory.description: Olive remembers facts and feelings. She recalls not just where you went, but what you thought about it.

wishlist.title: The Silent Wishlist Monitor
wishlist.description: Never miss a birthday. Olive watches the links your partner saves and nudges you when prices drop.

whatsappFirst.headline: Works where you already live.
whatsappFirst.description: No new apps to learn. Just forward a voice note, a photo, or a link to Olive on WhatsApp. She handles the filing.

items.quote: My husband sends 10 voice notes a day. Olive catches them all so I don't have to be his secretary.
items.author: Sarah

items.quote: We raised our seed round while juggling a million receipts. Olive saved us hours every week.
items.author: Marcus & Jen

items.quote: Finally stopped fighting about who forgot what. Olive is the neutral third party we needed.
items.author: David

pricing.headline: Simple, transparent pricing.
pricing.subheadline: Start free. Upgrade when you're ready.
pricing.trustNote: Cancel anytime. No credit card required for free tier.

footerCta.headline: Your relationship is too important to be disorganized.
footerCta.subheadline: Join thousands of partners who've traded chaos for clarity.
footerCta.trustNote: Free to start. No credit card required.
